Episodes.Title: The French Connection
Episodes.Actors: Gordon Ramsay, Gino D'Acampo, Fred Sirieix
Episodes.Plot: The boys are in Fred's homeland France, where Fred has been asked by a friend, 'The Oyster King', to help him host the first oyster festival in Arcachon. The trio must gather the best cheese, wine and oysters that France has to of...

Episodes.Title: The Highland Fling
Episodes.Actors: Gordon Ramsay, Gino D'Acampo, Fred Sirieix
Episodes.Plot: The trio head to Scotland as Gordon prepares to cook a feast for the chief of Clan Ramsay and his friends. As they tour the country they wear kilts, find Scottish beef, scallops and salmon and take part in the Ceres Highland Games.
